description: A midlayer built for anything from ski tours to alpine ascents, the Coefficient Fleece Hoody features Polartec® Power Dry® fleece with a gridded interior for increased wicking performance and added breathability. The under-the-helmet hood and quarter-length zipper let you regulate temperature on the go, so you don't find yourself overheating a half hour into the day. A slim cut helps the Coefficient Fleece Hoody fit comfortably under your shell and it easily stashes in your pack.
name: Black Diamond Coefficient 1/4-Zip Hoody - Mens
